org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.pipeline

Class TranslateOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.pipeline.TranslateOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderOperation

    public abstract class TranslateOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderOperation
    Applies/unapplies Graphics.translate(float, float). This class must be extended and implement updateTranslation(Vector2, GameContainer, float)
